original_title: 変形作品第3番＜ミックスジュース＞
overview: In front of a train station in the suburbs, a man chopping dried fish, chicken bones, and logs. When the man strikes with his machete, the entire scene begins to rotate. As if it had been put through a juicer, it was broken down into small pieces and eventually put into the glass the girl was holding.
title: Metamorphose Works No.3
